revised_title: Piotr Kapitza: A Legendary Figure in Science and Education
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Piotr Leonidovich Kapitza, a legendary figure in the world of science and education. Born into an intellectually rich family, Kapitza showed great versatility in his scientific work and made significant contributions to various fields of physics and technology. He also had a profound influence on the development of Soviet physics through his ideas on scientific education and organization. Kapitza's life took a turning point when he moved to Cambridge in 1921, where he worked under Ernest Rutherford and made a lasting impact on the scientific community.
